answers.answer: The basic package includes medical services for emergency situations, curative services for acute conditions, consultations for chronic diseases, detection of endemic-epidemic diseases, family planning services, palliative care, diagnostic and therapeutic services, pregnancy surveillance, and medical services for diagnostic purposes.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Specialist consultation'.

answers.answer: Specialized ambulatory medical assistance is typically provided in medical practices, health units, specialized and integrated outpatient clinics within hospitals, diagnostic and treatment medical centers, and palliative care clinics.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Specialist consultation'.

answers.answer: Individuals from the war zones of Ukraine can access specialist medical services without presenting a referral ticket or a prescription from a family doctor.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Consultations without prescription'.

answers.answer: Patients with chronic conditions can receive a maximum of 4 consultations per quarter, with a limit of 2 consultations per month.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Consultations without prescription'.

answers.answer: Consultations for chronic conditions or diseases with potential endemo-epidemic that require isolation can be offered remotely by any means of communication.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Consultations without prescription'.

answers.answer: Insured individuals with a confirmed diagnosis after hospitalization can receive up to two free consultations for tracking condition evolution, performing therapeutic procedures, wound/thread/cast removal, and recommendations for paraclinical investigations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'Consultations without prescription'.

answers.answer: Examples of day hospitalization services include monitoring normal and high-risk pregnancies, prenatal screening, and early detection and diagnosis of precancerous lesions of the breast and dysplastic lesions of the cervix.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: Day hospitalization services typically have a duration of less than 12 hours.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: After consultations, a specialist doctor can establish therapeutic conduct, prescribe treatment, recommend home care or medical devices, assess and monitor chronic conditions, release referral tickets for other specialties, and issue medical leave certificates.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: A specialist doctor can monitor the evolution of patients with chronic conditions quarterly or, as needed, monthly.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: A psychologist can provide psychological counseling and psychotherapy, as well as special psychopedagogical counseling, including through a speech therapist.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: Insured people can be recommended for psychologist or physiotherapist services by doctors with certain specializations, provided the outpatient clinic has qualified staff or a contract with a service provider.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: A physiotherapist offers individual or group physiotherapy, including physiotherapy with special devices like mechanical, electromechanical, or robotic devices.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: Psychiatric therapies, psychological counseling, psychotherapy, and services provided by a speech therapist can all be offered remotely through any means of communication.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.

answers.answer: Patients with conditions or aggravations after COVID-19 can benefit from physical therapy, psychological counseling, and psychotherapy, based on a recommendation from cardiology and pneumology doctors.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor and read the section under 'What other services can be provided'.
